result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for implementing the Katana API client and handling token swap requests in a blockchain context.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating the client implementation and its related data models, with a focus on testability through unit tests.

internal/infras/katana/client.go.purpose: This file implements a client for interacting with the Katana API, providing methods to fetch quotes and token information.

internal/infras/katana/client_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the Katana client functionality.

internal/infras/katana/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures and methods for handling token swap requests in a blockchain context.
